MeasurementToolMetadata.Description: The Motivation and Pleasure Scale â€“ Self-Report (MAP-SR)

mapsr1.Description: In the past week, what is the most pleasure you experienced from being with other people?

mapsr2.Description: In the past week, how often have you experienced pleasure from being with other people?

mapsr3.Description: Looking ahead to being with other people in the next few weeks, how much pleasure do you expect you will experience from being with others?

mapsr4.Description: In the past week, what is the most pleasure you experienced from hobbies, recreation, or from work?

mapsr5.Description: In the past week, how often have you experienced pleasure from hobbies, recreation, or from work?

mapsr6.Description: Looking ahead to the next few weeks, how much pleasure do you expect you will experience from your hobbies, recreation, or work?

mapsr7.Description: When it comes to close relationships with your family members, how important have these relationships been to you over the past week?

Levels.0: Not at all important to me

mapsr8.Description: When it comes to having a close relationship with a romantic partner, how important has this type of relationship been to you over the past week?

Levels.0: Not at all important to me

mapsr9.Description: When it comes to close relationships with your friends, how important have these relationships been to you over the past week?

Levels.0: Not at all important to me

mapsr10.Description: In the past week how motivated have you been to be around other people and do things with them?

mapsr11.Description: In the past week how much effort have you made to actually do things with other people?

mapsr12.Description: In the past week how motivated have you been to go to work or school or look for a job or class to take?

mapsr13.Description: In the past week how much effort have you made to do things at work or school? (If you are not working or going to school, how much effort have you made to look for a job or go to school.)

mapsr14.Description: In the past week how motivated have you been to do hobbies or other recreational activities?

mapsr15.Description: In the past week how much effort have you made to actually do any hobbies or recreational activities?
